com.jaunt_api.component
Class FormComponent

java.lang.Object
  com.jaunt_api.component.FormComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
ButtonComponent, FieldComponent, FileComponent, ImageComponent, SelectComponent, TextAreaComponent
public abstract class FormComponent
extends java.lang.Object

An abstract class representing a form's component (eg textfield, radiobutton, etc).
